arez.annotations

Annotation Type Repository


  • @Documented
 @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Unsupported(value="This may change in the future as it is incorporated with replicant and the wider ecosystem")
public @interface Repository
    Annotation that indicates that a repository must be generated for component. A repository is the default mechanism for managing instances of classes annotated with ArezComponent. The repository provides mechanisms to create a component, lookup a component by id or using a query and dispose the instance. These activities can be done by the user through other means but the repositories provide an easy solution.

    This annotation can only be added to classes that have been annotated with the ArezComponent annotation.

    Annotating a class with this annotation will result in the following artifacts.

    • A repository named "[MyComponent]Repository"
    • An interface used to define extensions of the repository "[MyComponent]BaseRepositoryExtension"

    The way to add custom queries or \@Computed queries is to define an interface that extends the base extension interface. The extension interface defines a self() method that you can use to get at the underlying repository. Using this combined with default methods you can define as many new queries and mutations as is desired. The extension class then needs to be registered by setting the appropriate parameter on this annotation.

    An example of what an extension may look like for a Todo component. See below:

    
 public interface MyTodoRepositoryExtension
   extends TodoBaseRepositoryExtension
 {
   default Todo findByTitle( final String title )
   {
     return self().findByQuery( todo -> todo.getTitle().equals( title ) );
   }

   \@Computed
   default List<Todo> findAllCompleted()
   {
     return self().findAllByQuery( Todo::isCompleted );
   }
 }

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Injectible dagger
      Indicate whether a dagger module should be generated for repository.
      Class[] extensions
      Return the list of extension interfaces that the repository will implement.
      Injectible inject
      Indicate whether an @Inject annotation should be added to constructor of the generated repository.
      String name
      Return the name of the repository.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        @Nonnull
public abstract String name
        Return the name of the repository. The value must conform to the requirements of a java identifier. The default value if not specified is the name of the associated ArezComponent suffixed with "Repository".
        Returns:
        the name of the repository.
        Default:
        "<default>"

      • extensions

        public abstract Class[] extensions
        Return the list of extension interfaces that the repository will implement. The extension interfaces should not define any non-default methods besides self().
        Returns:
        the list of extension interfaces that the repository will implement.
        Default:
        {}

      • dagger

        public abstract Injectible dagger
        Indicate whether a dagger module should be generated for repository. Injectible.TRUE will force the generation of the module, Injectible.FALSE will result in no dagger module and Injectible.IF_DETECTED will add a dagger module if the dagger.Module class is present on the classpath.
        Returns:
        enum controlling whether a dagger module should be generated for repository.
        Default:
        arez.annotations.Injectible.IF_DETECTED

      • inject

        public abstract Injectible inject
        Indicate whether an @Inject annotation should be added to constructor of the generated repository. Injectible.TRUE will force the addition of an @Inject annotation, Injectible.FALSE will result in no @Inject annotation and Injectible.IF_DETECTED will add an @Inject if any it is present on the classpath. Note that this is effectively Injectible.TRUE if dagger parameter is true.
        Returns:
        enum controlling present of Inject annotation on constructor of repository.
        Default:
        arez.annotations.Injectible.IF_DETECTED
